Name: Ragel
Output languages: C, C++, D, Go, Java, Objective-C, Ruby

Name: ANTLR3
Grammar, code: ActionScript, Ada95, C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, Objective-C, Perl, Python, Ruby

Name: AXE
column8: any platform with standard C++11 compiler

Name: Coco/R

Name: GOLD
Grammar, code: x86 assembly language, ANSI C, C#, D, Java, Pascal, Object Pascal,  Python, Visual Basic 6, Visual Basic .NET, Visual C++

Name: SableCC
Grammar, code: C, C++, C#, Java, OCaml, Python

Name: Whale

Name: lars::parser
Lexer algorithm: Packrat (modified to support left-recursion and resolve grammar ambiguity)
License: GNU GPL, commercial license available on request

Name: Waxeye
Output languages: C, Java, JavaScript, Python, Ruby, Scheme

Name: GDK
Grammar, code: C, Lex, Haskell, HTML, Java, Object Pascal, Yacc

Name: Whale Calf
Lexer algorithm: General tabular, SLL(k), Linear normal form (Conjunctive grammar), LR, Binary normal form (Boolean grammar)
